item.description:
The Purpose: The Purpose of the Weight Loss Challenge is to Have Fun, Lose Weight, and to Educate. So I ask you to join the challenge if you dare to learn!!! Start Living Your Healthy Lifestyle, Today!!!
What you get: The Challenge is run by your very own Personal Wellness Coach. Your coach will provide you with the Following: - Personalized Meal Plan - 1 on 1 Coaching (Daily) until you are at your Goal - Website Access (weekly material downloads) * Further details will be emailed to serious CHALLENGERS * So join the Group Today!!!
About: Past Weight Loss Challenges have proven to be an absolute success not just in Somerville, but across the Country. YOU, the Challengers, bring the most value to the Weekly Meetings. GROUP SUPPORT and ACCOUNTABILITY is what I aim for in every Class.
I look forward to speaking to you before the Next Challenge Start Date.
item.name: Weight Loss Challenge in Somerville
